name: Video World
description:
​Video World is a Halloween synth-pop musical about working at a video store.

Featuring:
🔸 3 synth-pop songs with lyrics
🔸 Rhythm based gameplay
🔸 An extremely realistic story about being a video store employee
🔸 Halloween decoration ideas
🔸 A sPoOkY amount of puns

Video World is a companion piece to the Video World EP by synth-pop artist Monster Mansion.
